snippet: “Ghost Brothers of Darkland County,” the Southern gothic musical by Stephen King and John Mellencamp that opened at the Alliance Theater in Atlanta, has the feel of something devised over Skype.
abstract: Jason Zinoman reviews Stephen King and John Mellencamp play Ghost Brothers of Darkland County, directed by Susan V booth, at the Alliance Theater in Atlanta; Lucas Kavner and Justin Guarini star.
lead_paragraph: “Ghost Brothers of Darkland County,” the Southern gothic musical by Stephen King and John Mellencamp that opened at the Alliance Theater in Atlanta, has the feel of something devised over Skype.

headline.seo: Stephen King and John Mellencamp’s Musical ‘Ghost Brothers’
headline.main: These Ghosts Are Singing With a Southern Twang
headline.print_headline: These Ghosts Are Singing With a Southern Twang
